parameters.name: override_date
parameters.description: today's date is encoded in data folder: add to a previous folder by specifying it here (yyyy-mm-dd)
parameters.help_text: today's date is encoded in data folder: add to a previous folder by specifying it here (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: min_units_across_sessions
parameters.description: minimum number of units per area across all sessions to be included - can be modified without creating a new data folder on S3
parameters.help_text: minimum number of units per area across all sessions to be included - can be modified without creating a new data folder on S3

parameters.name: conv_kernel_s
parameters.description: length of conv PSTH kernel, in seconds

parameters.name: align_to
parameters.description: column in trials table to align PSTHs to (pre and post will determine total window)

parameters.name: pre
parameters.description: length of time, in seconds, to capture before the event in `align_to`
parameters.help_text: length of time, in seconds, to capture before the event in `align_to`

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: length of time, in seconds, to capture after the event in `align_to`
parameters.help_text: length of time, in seconds, to capture after the event in `align_to`

parameters.name: include_only_good_blocks
parameters.description: discard individual blocks with dprime less than criteria in `good_block_dprime_threshold`
parameters.help_text: discard individual blocks with dprime less than criteria in `good_block_dprime_threshold`

parameters.name: good_block_dprime_threshold
parameters.description: cross modal dprime threshold applied to determine good blocks (has no effect if `include_only_good_blocks` is false)
parameters.help_text: cross modal dprime threshold applied to determine good blocks (has no effect if `include_only_good_blocks` is false)

parameters.name: include_good_blocks_in_bad_sessions
parameters.description: include single blocks that meet criteria, in sessions that fail overall (has no effect if `include_only_good_blocks` is false)
parameters.help_text: include single blocks that meet criteria, in sessions that fail overall (has no effect if `include_only_good_blocks` is false)
